title: Bowie Modern love cover type (2 fonts)
content:
Hi guys, can someone help with these two, or what they started with before being stretched?  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415193804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4334498761_154407b647_b_6547.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415193804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4334498761_154407b647_b_3666.jpg)
author: hungrymoon

comments.content:
Every second letter, i.e. \_M\_, \_D\_, \_L\_, \_R\_ and \_V\_ looks like LTC Spire  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-spire/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415193804/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-spire/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-spire/")  
Don

The other letters look like Empire [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/empire/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415193804/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/empire/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/empire/")  
Don
